nodes.text: A detention center was located onboard the Starlight Beacon space station. After the Skembo Ambassador Ceeril was discovered to have staged an assassination attempt against himself to try and frame two Hassarian patients in the station medcenter, Marshal Avar Kriss ordered Ceeril to be placed in the center for the remainder of his stay. Head of Security Ghal Tarpfen and Padawan Burryaga Agaburry escorted Ceeril to the facility.
